meanings.definition: A heavy textile fabric, typically used for carpets or wall hangings.
meanings.sent1: The tapis on the floor felt soft under my feet.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate patterns on the tapis in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the tapis was a perfect spot for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The tapis of memories woven into the fabric of our lives.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the tapis brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: A decorative cover for a table or chest.
meanings.sent1: The elegant tapis added a touch of class to the dining table.
meanings.sent2: She carefully folded the tapis after the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the tapis was a new place to explore.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed under the tapis of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The intricate embroidery on the tapis caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A type of thick, woven rug.
meanings.sent1: The cozy tapis kept their feet warm during the winter.
meanings.sent2: She rolled out the tapis in front of the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the tapis was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The tapis of friendship woven through shared experiences.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious tapis added a touch of elegance to the room.
